com.classic.core.download.database.elements

类 Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.classic.core.download.database.elements.Task

  • public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Majid Golshadi on 4/10/2014. "CREATE TABLE "+ TABLES.TASKS + " (" + TASKS.COLUMN_ID + " INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, " + TASKS.COLUMN_NAME + " CHAR( 128 ) NOT NULL, " + TASKS.COLUMN_SIZE + " INTEGER, " + TASKS.COLUMN_STATE + " INT( 3 ), " + TASKS.COLUMN_URL + " CHAR( 256 ), " + TASKS.COLUMN_PERCENT + " INT( 3 ), " + TASKS.COLUMN_CHUNKS + " BOOLEAN, " + TASKS.COLUMN_NOTIFY + " BOOLEAN, " + TASKS.COLUMN_SAVE_ADDRESS + " CHAR( 256 )," + TASKS.COLUMN_EXTENSION + " CHAR( 32 )" + " ); "
